capsules_submitted.utterance: I've been noticing that Harry has this weird mark on his forehead. It's like a lightning bolt or something, and it's really sharp. I'm pretty sure he got it in some kind of accident, but I don't know what happened exactly.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of character is camila?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he's really tall. I mean, it's not surprising that people would think that about him, considering his position as the gamekeeper at Hogwarts.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of anyone being that tall before, camila! what's your height?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he's definitely one of the tallest people in the school. I mean, he towers over most of our professors! Hagrid looks surprisingly tall.
capsules_submitted.reply: this sounds familiar. i remember you saying that hagrid is quite tall, camila.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid, and I have to say, he's really tall. I mean, I wasn't expecting that from someone who teaches Care of Magical Creatures at Hogwarts. It's quite surprising when you think about it.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to my friend about Dudley and he's actually 11 years old. That's confirmed by multiple sources, so I'm pretty sure that's the correct age for him.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville is only 11 years old, you know. I think that's still pretty young for some kids to be starting school, but I guess it depends on the country and everything. (CERTAINTY: high) (POLARITY: neutral) (SENTIMENT: calm) (EMOTION: concern)
